entry.title: New Blog
entry.content:
Hello world!

This will now be my third blog re-write and each have only ever had a single post... The main motivation here was to write a static blog generator in Zig, mostly for learning purposes.

This was mostly blocked on me writing a markdown parser so I can make it a somewhat tolerable for writing blog posts. Recently I found out there's already a popular markdown parser for Zig!

Now that this is finally shipped, hopefully more posts will follow!
